Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

official_title: Honoring the lives, and mourning the loss, of Sergeant Brandon Paudert and Officer Bill Evans, members of the West Memphis Police Department.

summary.text: Recognizes the ultimate sacrifice made by Sergeant Brandon Paudert and Officer Bill Evans, members of the West Memphis, Arkansas, Police Department, who were killed in the line of duty on May 20, 2010, and extends deepest condolences to the families and friends of those officers.

titles.title: Honoring the lives, and mourning the loss, of Sergeant Brandon Paudert and Officer Bill Evans, members of the West Memphis Police Department.
